widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 10), size = (470, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (30, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() if (textsize[0] > 500): textsize = (500, textsize[1]+22) elif (textsize[0] < 300): textsize = (300,textsize[1]+22) else: textsize = (textsize[0]+50,textsize[1]+22)
offset = 30 espacio= 10 laimagen="/share/enigma2/basic_retro_HD/flechasok-fs8.png" if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 30 laimagen="/share/enigma2/basic_retro_HD/flechas-fs8.png"
wsizex = textsize[0] + 68 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset+espacio if (wsizey < 53): wsizey=53 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) posbotonx=wsizex-83-4 posbotony=wsizey-33-4 self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(posbotonx+12, posbotony+4)) # self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
#if self.type == self.TYPE_ERROR: if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: self["InfoPixmap"].instance.setPixmapFromFile(laimagen) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(posbotonx, posbotony)) self["InfoPixmap"].show() #else: #self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.setPixmapFromFile(laimagen) #self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(posbotonx, posbotony)) #self["ErrorPixmap"].hide()
if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: self.list = [ (self.list[0][0].capitalize(), self.list[0][1]), (self.list[1][0].capitalize(), self.list[1][1]) ] self["selectedChoice"].setText(self.list[0][0]) self["list"].setList(self.list) #else: #self.list = [ (" Ok", 0) ] #self["selectedChoice"].setText(self.list[0][0]) #self["list"].setList(self.list)

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (85, 6), size = (410, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), # index 1 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (85, 43), size = (410, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (2, 8), size = (54, 54), png = 3), # index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (63, 46), size = (15, 16), png = 4), # index 4 is the default pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 70 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (635, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 37), size = (610, 60), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 21), gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 100 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(size=(145, 20), text = 1, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(145,0), size=(145, 20), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 20 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (920, 20), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 Title, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 20), size = (828, 17), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (920, 6), size = (120, 20), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 3), # index 3 begin time, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (828, 20), size = (154, 17), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 channel, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (982, 20), size = (58, 20), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # index 4 channel, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 37 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 5), size = (690, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 35), size = (690, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (700, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 58), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 4), size = (620, 26), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (520, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 26), size = (520, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (65, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (110, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17),gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"templates": {"default": (46, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, -2), size = (10, 22), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (12, -2), size = (35, 22), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (38, -2), size = (300, 22), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (48, 17), size = (322, 20), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (342, -2), size = (45, 22), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # x, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (46, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, -2), size = (10, 22), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (12, -2), size = (35, 22), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (38, -2), size = (300, 22), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (48, 17), size = (322, 20), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (342, -2), size = (45, 22), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # x, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 17), gFont("Regular", 16), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 46 }
